channel.title: android on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in android on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-08
item.description: Samsung confirms hackers stole Galaxy source code (2 minute read) Samsung has confirmed that hackers successfully stole internal company data and source code.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-17
item.description: Disney is developing planned communities for fans who never want to leave its clutches (3 minute read) Storyliving by Disney is a new part of the company’s theme park division that plans to develop a series of communities for residential living.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-16
item.description: A first look at Microsoft’s new Windows 11 Android apps support (3 minute read) Microsoft has released the first preview of its Android app support in Windows 11 to testers in the Windows Insider program.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-11
item.description: MoviePass is officially coming back (4 minute read) MoviePass co-founder Stacy Spikes has announced that the service will return this summer.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-14
item.description: Android 13 leaks: More Material You options, opt-in to app notifications (7 minute read) Android 13’s first developer previews won’t be out until at least March, but several sources have already begun leaking its new features.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-06
item.description: Google planning Apple-like integration between its products to compete (3 minute read) Google has announced plans to rival Apple’s ecosystem integration at CES 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-27
item.description: Exclusive: This is our first look at Android 13 “Tiramisu” and some of its upcoming features (5 minute read) A source with access to a very early Android 13 build has shared screenshots showing several upcoming features and changes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-10
item.description: WhatsApp Launches Instant Cryptocurrency Payments in the US (2 minute read) WhatsApp has launched a cryptocurrency payment feature with Novi integration for a limited number of users in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-02
item.description: Google announces grab bag of new Android features for the end of 2021 (3 minute read) Google has announced several updates coming to Android that include new widgets for some Google apps, new Android Auto features, and updates for Google Assistant and Google Photos.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-23
item.description: Android Messages update handles Apple iMessage reactions properly (2 minute read) Google Messages on Android can now properly display emoji reactions sent from the iPhone’s Messages app.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-28
item.description: LinkedIn rolls out its freelance services marketplace globally after picking up 2M users in smaller US beta (4 minute read) LinkedIn is opening up its Service Marketplace, a service that lets freelancers advertise to those looking to hire people for short-term engagements.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-21
item.description: Facebook is planning to rebrand the company with a new name (3 minute read) Facebook is planning to change its company name next week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-14
item.description: Apple developing new ‘Apple Pay Later’ service to let customers buy any Apple Pay purchases in monthly installments (2 minute read) Apple is working on a new service called Apple Pay Later that will allow users to buy products and pay them off in monthly installments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-25
item.description: Microsoft is bringing Android apps to Windows 11 with Amazon’s Appstore (2 minute read) Windows 11 will be able to run Android apps natively.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-09
item.description: Tesla buys $1.5 billion in bitcoin, plans to accept it as payment (2 minute read) Tesla announced that it bought $1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-17
item.description: Amazon wants to scan your body to make perfectly fitting shirts (2 minute read) Amazon recently unveiled a brand called ‘Made for You’ that makes custom-fitted clothes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-12
item.description: Airbnb plans to confidentially file for IPO this month (1 minute read) Airbnb is planning to submit a confidential filing with the SEC to go public this month, with shares trading by the end of the year.
